languages.text: "Не вздумай сдаваться! Только опустив руки, ты по настоящему потерпишь поражение!"
"I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"
languages.original_text: "Не вздумай сдаваться! Только опустив руки, ты по настоящему потерпишь поражение!"

traits.locale_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"
"I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"
"I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"
"I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"
"I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

languages.text: “我决不允许你产生任何放弃的念头！只有屈服于命运的人，才会真正地被打败！”
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: “我决不允许你产生任何放弃的念头！只有屈服于命运的人，才会真正地被打败！”

languages.text: «¡Le prohíbo el más mínimo pensamiento de rendición! ¡La verdadera derrota solo llega al resignarse al fracaso!».
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Le prohíbo el más mínimo pensamiento de rendición! ¡La verdadera derrota solo llega al resignarse al fracaso!».

languages.text: 「降伏することについて考えることさえ禁じる！運命を受け入れた者だけが真の敗北に屈するのだ！」
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: 「屈服について考えることさえ禁じる。運命を受け入れた者だけが真の敗北に屈するのだ！」
「降伏することについて考えることさえ禁じる！運命を受け入れた者だけが真の敗北に屈するのだ！」

languages.text: « Je vous interdis formellement de baisser les bras ! La seule vraie défaite, c'est de s'abandonner à son sort ! »
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous interdis formellement de baisser les bras ! La seule vraie défaite, c'est de s'abandonner à son sort ! »

languages.text: "Ich verbiete Euch jeden Gedanken an Aufgabe! Nur wer sich seinem Schicksal ergibt, erleidet wahrhaftig eine Niederlage!"
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verbiete Euch jeden Gedanken an Aufgabe! Nur wer sich seinem Schicksal ergibt, erleidet wahrhaftig eine Niederlage!"

languages.text: "Pes etmeyi aklından geçirme bile! Asıl yenilgi, kaderine boyun eğdiğinde gelir!"
languages.original_text: "I forbid you the very thought of yielding! Only by resigning to your fate will you truly suffer defeat!"

traits.locale_text: "Pes etmeyi aklından geçirme bile! Asıl yenilgi, kaderine boyun eğdiğinde gelir!"
